text: ( Photo : Youtube ) Taylor Swift ‘ s Reputation makeover is in full swing as her onstage comeback continues, although when it comes to some looks, the “ Old Taylor ” may just be mostly “ dead. ” The singer showcased a past favorite styles while performing at the 99. 7 NOW ’ s Poptopia concert at the SAP Center in San Jose, California on Saturday ; she wore a loose - fitting, long sleeve red, black and white plaid shirt over a mesh top, black shorts, paired with black lace - up boots.
